Detailed Description

The FeatureItemContainer contains Items like the ItemContainer but it has an additional handling for FeatureItems. FeatureItemContainers are used for full sized menus and popup menus. Each FeatureItemContainer can be identified by an id. FeatureItemContainers can have a context id, which is used, when selecting the feature item in a menu. If no context id is set, the context of the AtlWindow is used.
